name: ISO/IEC 15444-1:2004. Information technology -- JPEG 2000 image coding system -- Part 1: Core coding system, file format as specified in Annex I, with lossy encoded bitstream (formal name); JPEG 2000 jp2 file format with lossy data (common name)
